list.name: Changes
list.comment: Updated death_check to check for both allies and enemies and return a print value if the game has reached an end state. Updated combat_area and basic combat formatting.

task.summary: Worked on perform_ability() and was able to implement the cast-bar. Abilities with a cast time now will wait their appropriate amount of time before going off and will 'CC' the character who is casting when the spell is multiple turns long.

Updated To-Do list with stuff I have been considering since last session. Added "basic-enemy" to character dictionary. Changed constructer and functionality of some character methods to allow for creation of 'basic-enemies'

Updated Basic combat to have basic enemies instead of simple int health values. Updated all the methods that were previously using int values to "health" values. Also updated perform_ability to execute stun effects.
Created the combat_area function which creates an area that shows the layout of the fight including ally and enemy health values. Fixed various formatting errors with print statements as well.
Updated death_check to check for both allies and enemies and return a print value if the game has reached an end state. Updated combat_area and basic combat formatting.

MESSAGE.value: Worked on perform_ability() and was able to implement the cast-bar. Abilities with a cast time now will wait their appropriate amount of time before going off and will 'CC' the character who is casting when the spell is multiple turns long.

Updated To-Do list with stuff I have been considering since last session. Added "basic-enemy" to character dictionary. Changed constructer and functionality of some character methods to allow for creation of 'basic-enemies'

Updated Basic combat to have basic enemies instead of simple int health values. Updated all the methods that were previously using int values to "health" values. Also updated perform_ability to execute stun effects.
Created the combat_area function which creates an area that shows the layout of the fight including ally and enemy health values. Fixed various formatting errors with print statements as well.
Updated death_check to check for both allies and enemies and return a print value if the game has reached an end state. Updated combat_area and basic combat formatting.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Updated death_check to check for both allies and enemies and return a print value if the game has reached an end state. Updated combat_area and basic combat formatting.
